question:
Your colleague recently gave you a book. You had presentation and this book helped you in presentation. Write a letter to your colleague.
 - Your presentation was on
 - Why this presentation was important for you
 - How book helped you in presentation
text: I am writing to thank you for the book which you have lent me a couple of days ago to prepare for my presentation.

My slideshow was on "Big Data - Hadoop Technology". This is the technology I am currently using in my project. It gives brief description about the task and how it helps in migrating the current database to advanced level and the necessasity of storing the data using this method.

This demonstration was significant for me in order to promote our project and company to next level. Moreover, it helps me to enhance my knowledge and get better opportunities for my career growth. Also, the company's growth and reputation belongs to this display because it was an all India corporate sector meeting to know more about the standard of the company and its capability to acquire more business from the clients.

It is incredibly great book which helped me in preparing the minor points which I was not aware of them earlier. Furthermore, it eased my research in searching for the points to be elaborated in the meeting. It has wide information which may not be available in any other book and it aids me to prepare the slide within short duration.
I would like to thank you once again for the wonderful book you have lent me during my critical situation.
